title: P450atlas website released!
contents: The 16th International Symposium Cytochrome - P450 Biodiversity & Biotechnology featured the premiere of the P450atlas website - the ultimate reference for P450 enzyme

title: Our protein backbone reconstruction model deepBBQ published!
contents: The article describing our new program for protein backbone reconstruction 'deepBBQ' has just been accepted for publication in 'Biomolecules' journal.

title: Exchange students from France
contents: This summer two exchange students from France have visited our lab to work on the new version of the Bioshell package.
